rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature is suspended, you may put it onto the battlefield from exile. If you do, for each time counter on it, it enters with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Suspend 7–{U} [i](Rather than casting this, you may pay {U} to exile it with seven time counters. At your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, cast it for free. It has haste.)[/i]
